summary: The 'Bring the Space Shuttle Home Act' mandates the transfer of the Discovery space shuttle from the Smithsonian Institution to NASA's Johnson Space Center in Houston, Texas. It directs NASA and the Smithsonian to create a transfer plan within 90 days of enactment, estimated to take 18 months, including a cost and timeline. Title is to transfer to NASA, then to a nonprofit entity. The shuttle must be publicly exhibited near the Johnson Space Center to promote STEM education. The bill also authorizes necessary appropriations to facilitate the transfer.
